notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: S.J.: study design, acquisition, analysis, and interpretation of data, statistical analysis and drafting of the manuscript. D.J.S., D.Y., Z.W., A.M., Z.Z., M.S.: acquisition of data. I.S.C., J.M.: study design, material support. C.C.: study design, critical revision of the manuscript for important intellectual content, study supervision.
